type: Interprovincial truck surveys for the National Capital Region
short_summary: The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking a consultant to conduct surveys of interprovincial truck travel in the National Capital Region (NCR).
description: The assignment has two main technical components: A roadside truck survey near the Macdonald-Cartier Bridge; and A survey of establishments that generate interprovincial truck trips along with a trip diary survey of a sample of their trucks that are engaged in interprovincial activity.
